summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5536 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 3, H. E. Nelson Addition, being the alley between 23rd Avenue Northwest and 22nd Avenue Northwest, from West 83rd Street to West 85th Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 71086, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
